Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this incredible opportunity to purchase our top-of-the-line product. It's a game-changer in its industry and I truly believe it will bring immense value to your business. I'm willing to offer it to you for $1200000. This is a competitive price considering its worth to me is at least $1500000. I'm confident you'll see the value in this product and I'm looking forward to hearing your thoughts. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $1,200,000. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $1,200,000
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $800,000
